Title: Halter Evening Dress with Key Hole

----

Sku: J728

----

Price:

----

Sizes: 12, 8, 6, 14, 4, 10

Colors: off-white

Category: formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: J728-off-white-halter-evening-dress-with-key-hole_p.jpg

----

Description: This Grecian style gown is sublime. The chiffon gown features a crossed halter top that crossed in the open back as well. There is a peek-a-boo cutout in the bust that is detailed with intricate beading crossed around the waistline. The Chiffon skirt falls to the floor for a elegant classical look.
